name: Q.ME
overview:
Quotient.Me or “Q.Me” is a product scoring application that helps users find the right the product as quickly as possible.

Our mission is to provide a tool (Q.Me) that helps “consumers on the go” assess different products, make informed buying decisions, and reduce the time it takes to comparison shop.

Q.Me essentially puts two products in a head-to-head battle and uses social and scientfic analysis to determine which product is right for you.

“Q.Me” scores products based on the user’s product inputs, preferences, location, social networks, historical selections, and internet databases.

Additionally, “Q.Me” benefits consumers by ensuring that available deals, discounts, and coupons are highlighted for the selected products and also recommends product reviews for further consideration.

“Q.Me” benefits companies by ensuring that the right advertisements and specials are seen by their customers at the right time: When they are comparison shopping.
